name: To Move Through Body and Speech
author: Lano Belsho

name: High Priestess
ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

firstNightReminder: The Sponsor points to a player. That player and the Sponsor swap seats. Mark that player with the "Sponsored" reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Sponsor points to a player. That player and the Sponsor swap seats. Mark that player with the "Sponsored" reminder.
name: Sponsor
ability: Each night, choose a player: you swap seats & they become healthy & sober. Until dusk, abilities that target them target you instead.
flavor: We must always take sides. Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim. Silence encourages the tormentor, never the tormented.

otherNightReminder: The Dancer points to a player. That player and the Dancer swap seats. You may show the Dancer that player's character token, then mark the Dancer with the "Drunk" reminder.
name: Dancer
ability: Each night*, choose a player: you swap seats. You might learn their role and become drunk.
flavor: There are shortcuts to happiness, and dancing is one of them.

name: Coward
ability: Each night*, the Demon is likely to become farther from you. You might overcome Gnomish magic.
flavor: Always do what you are afraid to do.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Town Crier points to a player. Mark that player 'Protected'.
name: Town Crier
ability: Each night*, if you are sat at 12:00, choose a player: they cannot die until dusk. Each day*, if you are sat at 6:00, publicly choose a player sat at 12:00: if they are evil, you swap seats.
flavor: Hear ye! Hear ye! Witchcraft in the labyrinth! Genius savant reveals all! Town ind danger! Hear ye!

otherNightReminder: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Friendly Drunk points to an alive player. Mark that player or the Friendly Drunk 'Drunk'.
name: Friendly Drunk
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player you neighbor: you might become drunk until dusk or you swap seats & they become drunk until dusk.
flavor: You don't really truly know someone until you get ridiculously drunk with them.

name: Doomsayer
ability: If you are not mad about being the Atheist, you become the Atheist & do not learn this.
flavor: And on the Seventh Day, there shall be a great flood and a pestilence aupon the People of the Village of the Ravens! The dead shall rise and the living shall repent! O Woe! O Unholy day! Only by the great sacrifice shall they prevail! So sayeth the Sages of Nostors and so sayeth I.

name: Friend
ability: If you neighbor 1 good player & 1 evil player, the good player cannot die at night & the evil player cannot die during the day.
flavor: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.

firstNightReminder: The Demiurge makes a speech motion or a silence motion. Mark them with the appropriate reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Demiurge makes a speech motion or a silence motion. Mark them with the appropriate reminder. Choose a good player. They die.
name: Demiurge
ability: Each night, you may compel the Storyteller to speak or to abstain from speaking. If the Storyteller dies, you become drunk instead. Each night*, a good player dies.
flavor: Creativity is a place where only you can go. Your discovery there will be wonderful for you will have discovered yourself.

otherNightReminder: The Gnome points to a player. That player dies.
name: Gnome
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. All Storyteller abilities are doubled. You may control player movement abilities. At dusk, if you have been sat at 12:00 for 2 consecutive days, evil wins.
flavor: Creativity is a place where only you can go. Your discovery there will be wonderful for you will have discovered yourself.
